subject: YAPC::NA is just around the corner
header: YAPC::NA, a.k.a. The Perl Conference is less than 3 weeks away, the early-bird discount will end in 5 days, and the hotel discount ends tomorrow!
There are also 7 tutorials around the conference with trainers such as Damian Conway, John Anderson, Dave Rolsky, Sawyer X, Mickey Nasriachi, and yours truly.
If you can't wait the 3 weeks to get your Perl fix, read on. There are a few really good articles this week.

entries.title: A Date with CPAN, Part 10: Cleanliness Is Next to Timeliness
entries.author: buddy_burden
entries.text: Outsourcing the hard part of understanding what are the bugs in your code to the 'cloud'. Also known as Slaven ReziÄ‡, one of the busy CPAN Testers.
